description:
A podcast developed with anstarting point in the danish novel Forsvindingsnumreby Amalie Langballe. The title of the novel is directly translated into disappearingacts.

The podcast is made fromcuriosity of the term daydreaming. Why do we daydream? And when? What happens in the brain when we daydream? All these questions havebeen leading intothe exploration of the unofficial diagnosis that goes by the name Maladaptive daydreaming. A disorderthat makes the victim unable to function in normally in an everyday life due to an excessive amount of daydreaming.
